TEXT.TITLE: COMPAQ COMPUTER <CPQ> COFOUNDER LEAVING
TEXT.BODY: Compaq Computer Corp said cofounder and vice president of sales is resigning effective April 20 and will enter a masters in religious education program in Houston this summer. Reuter
